title: Add entry point-based policy discovery to mettagrid
description:
The policy discovery in mettagrid/python/src/mettagrid/policy/loader.py only searches hardcoded packages (mettagrid.policy, metta.agent.policy, cogames.policy). External policies like metta_spider can't register short names.

Would need to add entry point support like `[project.entry-points."mettagrid.policies"]` so external packages can register policies via pyproject.toml.

title: Multi-agent coordination produces fewer hearts than independent agents
description:
The new role-based coordination approach (commit fc6c565) produces fewer hearts than the old independent-agent approach (commit 86b36ce).

**Results on training_facility with 4 agents:**
- Old (independent): 56.33 hearts/episode
- New (coordinated): 38.67 hearts/episode  
- Baseline: 6.33 hearts/episode

**Root cause hypothesis:**
1. Only 1 assembler (SILICON role) - old policy had 4 agents assembling in parallel
2. Deposit/withdraw overhead adds steps that don't produce hearts
3. Coordination bottleneck serializes heart production

**Options to explore:**
- Hybrid: share map knowledge but let everyone assemble independently
- More assemblers: multiple agents can assemble
- Smarter task assignment based on agent position/state
